title: League still not compatible with windows 10?
body: I got myself a new pc with windows 10 the other day and all of the sudden whenever I start up the launcher and launch the game it tells me that libcurl.dll and zlib.dll aren't being qualified for windows... someone else with this problem or is it just me?

replies.body:
Check your Windows 10 version by going to Start - Settings (the icon above the power button).
Then go to System, and click About.
Pay attention to the version number, if the version number is not 1706, then you need to download Windows 10 1706, which is Windows 10 Creators Update, google search Windows 10 Creators Update, download and install it, then install League of Legends.
I have no problem running League of Legends on my Windows 10 computer.
I also remember having trouble starting the game but I don't have any trouble anymore. I forgot what i did exactly, sorry :D

Hi. I literally just had this problem not a week ago (playing on a new PC).

I think the problem was is that League is only compatible with the latest version of window, so make sure to update and restart your computer and then reinstall League. If it still doesn't work after that just hit me with a reply and I'll see if I can help :)
It is compatible with windows 10. Not sure why its not wprkimg for you.
